segments.text: May I see a hat , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll measure you . . . You take size 6 . What colour hat would you like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here are some nice brown hats.Try this hat on.It ' s a very good one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I like this one.It goes very well with my coat . How much is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's $ 9.95 . Do you want me to put it in a box ?
segments.speaker: S2
